attributes.action: make all MPs planning to stand down at the next election due to expenses scandals to leave parliament now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The most discraced MPs in the current expenses scandal will not leave for close to a year. This is not enough! they must go now clearing the way for by - elections so the people can have there say on the state of parliament. Tjis goes for cabinet ministers too. Constituents deserve better representatives and it is their right as citizens to select them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
